name: Sex Coach: Hot Yoga - Prologue
description:
In the captivating world of fitness and luxurious lifestyle, a young and charismatic yoga master chooses the path to heights. His name is Adam, and his goal is to inspire people to lead a healthy lifestyle through the practice of yoga. The fascinating world of his work draws him into the incredibly prestigious fitness club "Dream Body," where the desire to achieve the perfect body and luxurious life becomes a true purpose.

However, when Thelma, the mysterious and powerful club manager, offers him a job, Adam cannot refuse. The mystery surrounding this proposition is unknown, but it promises unpredictable challenges and new opportunities for his career.

During his time at the club, Adam meets various intriguing characters. Each of them has their own unique story and secrets, and interacting with each can be the key to unraveling the tangled stories of the club. From luxurious clients to mysterious staff members, Adam may find himself at the center of events, where the true faces of people will be revealed, and secrets that could penetrate his own yoga world.

At every step, trials, unforeseen circumstances, and choices await him, determining the fate of both Adam and the "Dream Body" fitness club. In this exciting world, a blend of emotions, personality development, and unpredictable events is woven. Embark on a journey through the rich world of Sex Coach: Hot Yoga - Prologue an engaging visual novel for adults, and uncover all its mysteries.

Features:
  • A fascinating story
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
